Sure! Here are some romantic things to do in San Francisco:

1. Take a scenic drive down Lombard Street: Often called "the crookedest street in the world," it is a hot spot for couples to take a romantic drive while taking in the picturesque views. 2. Walk along the Embarcadero: Stroll along San Francisco's waterfront, taking in the famous Ferry Building, Bay Bridge and ambiance of Fisherman's Wharf. 3. Enjoy the views at Coit Tower: Take the elevator up to the top of Coit Tower for breathtaking views of San Francisco - this is also a great spot to watch the sunset with your significant other. 4. Tour the Palace of Fine Arts: This beautiful landmark features stunning architecture and a peaceful lagoon surrounded by lush parkland, perfect for a romantic picnic. 5. Visit the de Young Museum: Explore this wonderful museum, known for its stunning exhibitions of American art, featuring premier collections of American paintings, sculpture, and decorative art. 6. Take a ferry to the Golden Gate Bridge: Go on a ferry adventure with your date, anchored at the Golden Gate Bridge, afterwards explore nearby trails and picnicking spots. 7. Book a romantic dinner for two: San Francisco is home to countless restaurants, from Michelin-starred places to equally-lovely old-school restaurants, that offer romantic ambiance and seating arrangements for couples. I hope these suggestions help you plan your next romantic outing in San Francisco!
